ygData.msgSnippet: I am doing it in a fair way. I am taking into consideration of mutates condition vs. this charachters condition and his abilities which Hugar does know about.

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

I am doing it in a fair way. I am taking into consideration of mutates 
condition vs. this charachters condition and his abilities which Hugar does 
know about. In mutates damaged state the recoil from the gun would likely 
throw the shot off its regular course. and no charachter in the RPG has god 
accuracy.

--part1_31.1d1e081d.29154639_boundary
